books.title: The White Feather
books.author: P. G. Wodehouse
books.summary: A student tries to restore his honor among his schoolmates by learning to box.

books.title: Sir Percy Hits Back
books.author: Baroness Orczy
books.summary: A young woman doing a good deed is inadvertently caught up in the injustice of the French Revolution.

books.title: Running a Thousand Miles for Freedom
books.author: William Craft
books.summary: The authors escape from slavery by posing as a slaveowner and his slave.

books.title: The Lives and Opinions of Eminent Philosophers
books.author: Diogenes Laërtius
books.summary: Brief biographies of the prominent philosophers of ancient Greece.

books.title: Ozma of Oz
books.author: L. Frank Baum
books.summary: A girl gets whisked away to a fairy land and helps restore the proper rulers to the throne.

books.title: David Harum
books.author: Edward Noyes Westcott
books.summary: An aimless young man leaves the city for a small village to work for a horse-trading country banker.

books.title: Richard III
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.summary: King Edward IV’s brother, Richard of Gloucester, ascends to the English throne through deadly machinations.

books.title: The House of the Wolfings
books.author: William Morris
books.summary: A tribe of Goths must defend their land from a Roman invasion.

books.title: The Old Man in the Corner
books.author: Baroness Orczy
books.summary: An elderly man explains to a woman reporter how he solved crimes that stumped the local police.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Manly Wade Wellman
books.summary: A collection of horror and science fiction stories by Manly Wade Wellman.

books.title: Incidents in the Life of a Slave Girl
books.author: Linda Brent
books.summary: The autobiography of a woman who grew up in, and escaped from, slavery.

books.title: Kate Plus 10
books.author: Edgar Wallace
books.summary: A police inspector investigates an enigmatic young woman and her connection with various criminal activities.

books.title: Culture and Anarchy
books.author: Matthew Arnold
books.summary: Matthew Arnold describes what he considers to be the flaws in Victorian British society.

books.title: The Kural
books.author: Thiruvalluvar
books.summary: An Indian weaver-philosopher expounds on the subjects of righteousness, wealth, and love.

books.title: Pan Tadeusz
books.author: Adam Mickiewicz
books.summary: A young nobleman explores romance, feuding families, politics, and national identity during a period of social upheaval and Russian occupation.

books.title: The Devil’s Dictionary
books.author: Ambrose Bierce
books.summary: A witty, sharp collection of sardonic word definitions from the 1800s and early 1900s that provide a snapshot into the irreverent humor of early American culture.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Robert Sheckley
books.summary: A collection of science fiction and fantasy stories by Robert Sheckley ordered by date of publication.

books.title: While the Billy Boils
books.author: Henry Lawson
books.summary: A short story collection based on Australian colonial life in 1890s.

books.title: The Imitation of Christ
books.author: Thomas à Kempis
books.summary: Thomas à Kempis provides instructions for a Christian spiritual life.

books.title: The Giant Raft
books.author: Jules Verne
books.summary: An ex-slave trader with an encrypted note schemes about its meaning, while a man with a secret past travels with his family down the Amazon in a giant raft to attend his daughter’s wedding.
